attributes.action: Stop wrecking the country and Call an election so we can have an elected PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country is being wrecked by the PM and his hangers on. Everyday we hear about a new case of government incompentence, corruption or sleaze.

Enough is Enough! its time for an elected government, that will stop more immigrents flooding this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
